article: aer lingus group plc has formally rejected a takeover bid by rival airline ryanair , telling shareholders in its defense document published friday that the offer places a low value on the formerly state-controlled carrier .
abstract: aer lingus rebuffs derisory takeover bid from no-frills rival ryanair
